Package gameClient

Class CL_Pokemon

java.lang.Object
gameClient.CL_Pokemon
public class CL_Pokemon
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the pokemon in the game. Each pokemon has: value - which represents the pokemon's value. edge - which represents the current pokemon's edge. type - which represents the pokemon's type. If the type is 1: the pokemon is on the edge from the lesser node to the greater node, (according to the ID's value of the node). If the type is -1: the pokemon is on the edge from the greater node to the lesser node. pos - a 3D point that represents the position of the agent in the graph. currNode - which represents the current agent's node. id - which represents the pokemon's ID, which combines its coordinates.
